item.title: Mexico announces big meth seizure amid pressure from Trump
item.description: Mexico has announced a series of major drug discoveries in recent weeks in an apparent attempt to highlight increased efforts to combat drug smuggling...

item.title: New law in Vietnam derided as bid to quell all critique of communist rule
item.description: A rights group calls Vietnam's new "Decree 147" social media crackdown a bid by the Communist Party to put an "icy stranglehold on free speech."

item.title: 14 killed in narco gang clashes as police warn of "reprisals"
item.description: In one incident, gunmen on motorcycles fired into a crowd gathered outside a grocery store, killing a child and six adult, police said.

item.title: Top U.S., Russian diplomats meet on improving ties, ending Ukraine war
item.description: Senior officials from the U.S. and Russia meet in Saudi Arabia on improving ties and ending the war in Ukraine - but Ukraine isn't invited.

item.title: Powering a cleaner future for mobile work worldwide
item.description: Instagrid has developed high-performance portable power supplies that provide fume-free, silent alternatives to harmful gas-powered combustion generat...
